title: Advent Week 2 with Ruth Chou Simons
description:
Welcome to the second week of Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light! This week, join Raechel and Amanda as they trace the promises of light throughout several Old Testament narratives, alongside their friend, author, artist, entrepreneur, speaker, and mom to half a dozen boys, Ruth Chou Simons. Encouragement can be found at every twist and turn of this week’s conversation as the three remind one another that despite our natural tendencies, we can leave the chaos of the season and our never ending Christmas checklists behind as we intentionally seek to make much of Jesus through a few small, yet meaningful moments with those we love. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the Advent 2021: The Everlasting Light collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/advent-week-2-with-ruth-chou-simons
